title: Ghosts Couples Forecast: EPs Preview Who’s (Maybe) Breaking Up, Who’s Not Getting Together and More
description: Is there love after life? According to Ghosts, the answer is a resounding “Yes!” Over the CBS comedy’s run, the show’s many spirits have paired up (Thor and Flower), hooked up (Trevor and Hetty) or almost gotten hitched (Isaac and Nigel). In the Season 4 finale, a new twosome took a big step forward when […]
author: Vlada Gelman

title: Daredevil: Born Again: Krysten Ritter to Return as Jessica Jones in Season 2
description: Krysten Ritter is putting that well-worn leather jacket back on. Ritter, who previously played Marvel hero Jessica Jones in two Netflix projects, is confirmed to reprise that role via Daredevil: Born Again‘s upcoming second season on Disney+. The actress’ return was announced by Matt Murdock himself, Charlie Cox, at Disney’s Upfront presentation to advertisers on […]
author: Riannucci

title: Will Trent EPs Unpack the Finale, Will and Angie’s Relationship and Tease Season 4
description: The Will Trent EPs spilled details on the finale, including Will's paternity and his relationship with Angie. Check it out! The post Will Trent EPs Unpack the Finale, Will and Angie’s Relationship and Tease Season 4 appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: Will Trent Season 3’s Action-Packed Finale Left Two Main Characters In Mortal Danger
